questions.text: What criminal escaped from prison in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
The Toyman.

	He used a deadly Yoyo to kill a guard who had brought him breakfast. Toyman was played by Henry Czerny.

questions.text: Who was flying with Supergirl near the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Martian Manhunter.

	He was training her on how to fly properly, and was in his Martian form.This was the first time he appeared in public in his Martian form.

questions.text: Toyman was related to which other character?
questions.explanation:
Wynn.

	He was Wynn's father. "He stopped being my dad the day he blew up a toy bomb and killed half a dozen people". Wynn said in explaining why he didn't talk about his father.   The bomb was hidden in a teddy bear sent to his boss, who had stolen his toy designs.

questions.text: Where was the "favorite place" that Toyman told his son to meet him?
questions.explanation:
The arcade.

	While inside, the police busted in and shot Toyman, but it turned out to be a holographic representation not the actual man. He then tried to kill everyone in the room with a poisonous gas released from stuffed elephants.

questions.text: What did Cat do when she found out one of her employees was related to Toyman?
questions.correct: She tried to set up a TV interview with him
options: She demanded he publicly renounce his father
Nothing, she just filed it away for use later
questions.explanation:
She tried to set up a TV interview with him.

	She wanted to know if he could cry on cue, but settled on not allowing him to speak to other media outlets. "He's fired if I see him talking to Diane Sawyer", she said.

questions.text: Who did Alex go on a date with?
questions.explanation:
Maxwell Lord.

	She was trying to uncover exactly what Maxwell was building in his apparent quest to best Supergirl. During the date, the Martian Manhunter shape shifted into Maxwell and tried to break into his labs.

questions.text: Who initiated the kiss between Wynn and Kara?
questions.explanation:
Wynn.

	She pulled away immediately and he apologized. Then he got up and left the apartment right away. As he left he was kidnapped by his father, and it wasn't explained how Kara didn't hear it happening just outside.

questions.text: Who did the Toyman want to kill?
questions.explanation:
Chester Dunholz.

	The plan was to force his son to kill Dunholz at the National City Toy Convention. He forced his son into attempting to do the deed by hiding 10 bombs across the city. Supergirl stopped the FBI from killing Wynn, but was unable to stop the bombs from going off in the convention center.

questions.text: Lucy Lane took a job doing what at CatCo?
questions.explanation:
Corporate attorney.

	She's a Harvard trained lawyer who was a high ranking Army official until a few episodes earlier. She was given an office on the 10th floor of the building, where her boyfriend James and the rest of the main characters worked.

questions.text: How did Maxwell find out that Alex and Supergirl were related?
questions.correct: He hid a recording device in Alex's purse.
options: Toyman figured it out and sold him the information.
He had drones following Supergirl around.
questions.explanation:
He hid a recording device in Alex's purse.

	Kara, in full Supergirl regalia, flew into Alex's apartment and was caught by the device having a conversation with Alex.  The conversation included reference to them being sisters, and they talked about their younger days.
